1.text: Score the cork foil with a knife and peel it away.

2.text: Set the corkscrew in place on top of the cork.
2.vid: /7/79/Open a Bottle of Wine Step 2 Version 3.360p.mp4

3.text: Twist the handle clockwise to drill the screw into the cork.
3.vid: /8/80/Open a Bottle of Wine Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Push down on the wings to pull the cork upward.
4.vid: /a/ab/Open a Bottle of Wine Step 4 Version 3.360p.mp4

5.text: Cut off the cork foil with the folded knife.
5.vid: /4/47/Open a Bottle of Wine Step 5 Version 3.360p.mp4

6.text: Unfold the corkscrew and insert it in the cork.
6.vid: /6/6b/Open a Bottle of Wine Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

7.text: Dislodge the cork slightly by using the lever arm’s ridges for leverage.
7.vid: /2/2a/Open a Bottle of Wine Step 7 Version 3.360p.mp4

8.text: Pull up on the handle to remove the cork.
8.vid: /e/ec/Open a Bottle of Wine Step 8 Version 3.360p.mp4

9.text: Cut off the foil that covers the cork.
9.vid: /c/c7/Open a Bottle of Wine Step 9 Version 3.360p.mp4

10.text: Grab a clean 2 in (5.1 cm) screw and a set of pliers.

11.text: Twist the screw clockwise into the cork with a screwdriver.
11.vid: /9/96/Open a Bottle of Wine Step 11 Version 3.360p.mp4

12.text: Grip the neck of the screw with the pliers and pull upward.
12.vid: /3/3b/Open a Bottle of Wine Step 12 Version 3.360p.mp4

13.text: Use a clean screw-in hook instead of a traditional screw.

14.text: Cut the cork foil with a knife tip and peel it away.

15.text: Place the wine bottle upside down between your thighs.

16.text: Rap the bottle firmly but carefully with the sole of a shoe.
16.vid: /8/82/Open a Bottle of Wine Step 16 Version 3.360p.mp4

17.text: Check the cork and pull it out by hand when you can firmly grasp it.

18.text: Twist the bottom of the bottle and the cap in opposite directions.

19.text: Twist the bottle’s sleeve (or skirt) instead of the cap if it will rotate.

20.text: Try a dish towel, pliers, or various bottle-opener gadgets.
